thread.title: Namaste, IPA: Stressed Out in Yoga Class? Have a Beer

author: Jen Murphy
title: Namaste, IPA: Stressed Out in Yoga Class? Have a Beer
text:
Keri Stein tried to incorporate yoga into her routine for years. However, she found most yoga classes stressful. “I felt this pressure to do every pose perfectly.”
Then she found something that helped. Beer. 

“Inhale, the aroma of hops. Exhale, sink more deeply into your side lunge,” her instructor said on a recent day. “Inhale, raise your... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
